content: Formulate a list of 20 words that contain 'qu'.

Certainly! Here is a list of 20 words that contain the letter combination "qu":

1. quite
2. queen
3. quick
4. quiet
5. quaint
6. quirk
7. quiver
8. quote
9. quarrel
10. quadrant
11. quantity
12. quality
13. quantum
14. quagmire
15. quench
16. quiver
17. quadratic
18. quasar
19. quinine
20. quilt

I hope this helps! If you have any other questions, feel free to ask.
